Class Robot.ColorDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Robot.ColorDetector
  • Enclosing class:
    Robot

    public static class Robot.ColorDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    ColorDetector Class Represents the color detector unit, both motor and sensor

      • setMotorDegree

        protected static void setMotorDegree(SensorLocation location,
                  int degree)
        Set the color sensor motor degree, called when calibrating the sensor's motor or setting it to default
        Parameters:
        location - The location to set degree of
        degree - The degree to set
        See Also:
        loadDegrees(), setMotorDefaultDegrees()

      • loadThresholds

        public static void loadThresholds()
        Load calibrated color sensor white threshold from existing file

        In case of calibration file not exist or error while reading - default thresholds will be loaded

      • loadDegrees

        public static void loadDegrees()
        Load calibrated color sensor degrees from existing file

        In case of calibration file not exist or error while reading - default thresholds will be loaded

      • setDefaultThresholds

        public static void setDefaultThresholds()
        Set white thresholds to default
